divs: Sighting DetailsI just got back to my friends house (the friend lives 5 houses down from me) from riding my bike at a session at skaters paradise. I took my bike out of my friends car and started to ride back to my house when I looked up and noticed a glowing orb that was moving very fast then suddenly stopped and seemed to hover for a moment...then it suddenly flew back the same way it came from and merged together with a larger triangle shaped object then sped off really fast. There was no noise coming from the triangular shaped object which I thought to be very wierd. I noticed the Glowing Orb because it was the only thing moving in the sky and it was brighter than stars, I thought it might have been a meteorite of somesort. I was very frightened when I seen it stop suddenly. I havent told anyone in fear that I will be ridiculed.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Oxford
There were no other sightings in Oxford on or around January 6th 2007
